vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a loan from the Texas Water Development Board (TWDB) for low-cost financial assistance through the Flood Infrastructure Fund for Texas in an amount up to $90,090,000; (2) acceptance of a grant from the TWDB through the Flood Infrastructure Fund for Texas, in an amount up to $23,100,000, for eligible projects included in the Dallas Water Utilities Capital Improvement Program and designated by the TWDB as Project No. 40208; and (3) execution of the Financing Agreements and related documents - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a loan from the Texas Water Development Board (TWDB) for low-cost financial assistance through the Flood Infrastructure Fund for Texas in an amount up to $90,090,000; (2) acceptance of a grant from the TWDB through the Flood Infrastructure Fund for Texas, in an amount up to $23,100,000, for eligible projects included in the Dallas Water Utilities Capital Improvement Program and designated by the TWDB as Project No. 40208; and (3) execution of the Financing Agreements and related documents - Financing: This action has no cost consideration to the City (see Fiscal Information)
